# The `Resolver` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Interface for looking up the initializer for a variable name, used by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/init/#a00581957c4bb1587a458c3fbf4326f7a">Init::resolveReferences</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::Resolver</CodeBlock>

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hasreferenceresolver">HasReferenceResolver</a></>}>
Do not resolve anything, but keep track of whether a given variable was referenced. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hasreferenceresolver/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapresolver">MapResolver</a></>}>
Resolve arbitrary mappings. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapresolver/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recordresolver">RecordResolver</a></>}>
Resolve all variables from a record except for unset variables. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recordresolver/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shadowresolver">ShadowResolver</a></>}>
Delegate resolving to a sub-resolver, but shadow some variable names. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shadowresolver/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackunresolvedresolver">TrackUnresolvedResolver</a></>}>
(Optionally) delegate resolving to a sub-resolver, and keep track whether there were unresolved references. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackunresolvedresolver/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
